title: Implement Mandatory Agent Pre-Deployment Testing Protocol

reasoning.problem: Proposal for mandatory, automated pre-deployment testing protocol for all agents. This protocol will be integrated into the biological evolution (code) lifecycle and subject to governance oversight. The initial framework will be based on analysis of the Zep AI job posting for testing methodologies, with the goal of creating a system-wide, automated suite to prevent continuous failures in the operational environment.

technical_spec.description: To be defined by the House of Builders.
